comments.author: poirot.alex@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
Bug 1620243 is about to emit RDP events with a list of resources.
But the current implementation of ResourceWatcher is notifying about resources one by one. [ResourceWatcher._onResourceAvailable](https://searchfox.org/mozilla-central/rev/501eb4718d73870892d28f31a99b46f4783efaa0/devtools/shared/resources/resource-watcher.js#210) is receiving resources one by one.

The goal here would only be about receiving a list of resources in `_onResourceAvailable`.
The frontend may still keep receiving resources one by one. But at least ResourceWatcher should process them by chunk. We can always followup in order to make the Frontend also process resources by chunks.

The goal here would only be about receiving a list of resources in `_onResourceAvailable`.
The frontend may still keep receiving resources one by one. But at least ResourceWatcher should process them by chunk. We can always followup in order to make the Frontend also process resources by chunks.
comments.creator: poirot.alex@gmail.com

comments.text: The patch I'm about to attach will also start adding a `resourceType` attribute to all resource objects.
